Player A Health: 50 Strength: 5

Player A Health: 50 Player B Health: 10

Attacker caused 20 damage to the Player B Player attacks Player for 20 damage.
Player A Health: 50 Player B Health: 10

Player A Health: 50 Player B Health: 10

Attacker caused 20 damage to the Player B Player attacks Player for 20 damage.
Player A Health: 50 Player B Health: 10

Player A Health: 50 Player B Health: -30 Player A wins!
